instructions: Check Phone Compatibility with the Fitbit Mobile App Click here to check if your phone is compatible with the Fitbit app. If your phone is compatible with Fitbit, continue to step 2. If your phone is not compatible with Fitbit try a different app such as Argus. Download Fitbit Download the Fitbit app from the Apple App Store, Google Play Store, or Windows Store. Join Fitbit Tap Join Fitbit if you don t have an account with Fitbit yet. Choose Mobile Track Option When asked which tracker you re setting up, choose No Fitbit Yet? and follow the MobileTrack instructions.
